title: Chroma packs in ranked?
body: Okay, so I decided to play a ranked game was really excited about the new pick and ban and so on, well I realized in the game after I had picked my ADC (Vayne) the chroma pack was not showing up for me when I chose dragon slayer, I honestly don't know if it's a glitch or if they aren't enabled in ranked or something like that but it was saddening to me :(

replies.body:
Hiya Forsaken Rage,

This is one of a few known issues with the new Champion Select. At the moment, you aren't able to select ward skins or chroma packs. We're actively working to resolve the issue.
Thank you so much Riot KateyKhaos ^-^ Keep up the good work :)
